author: Dmitry Bruso
comment: Most of all your watch face looks perfect on my new LG Watch Sport

author: Sean McGowan
comment: I use it to manage time for my travel ball teams works great

author: Eddie Espinoza
comment: I've emailed the dev a week ago and still haven't got a response. As I explained in my email the timer works after I mash my watch repeatedly 30 times to get it going. I haven't got the stop watch to work at all.

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Sorry for that situation. Answered to your e-mail.

title: It doesn't work on my moto 360 2nd gen.
